      • SimpleStepFunctionCompressor

        public SimpleStepFunctionCompressor(int minSizeToBeCompressed,
                                    double minImpurityIncreaseForRecord,
                                    double minImpurityDecreaseForRecord)
        Constructs a new instance of simple step function compressor.
        Parameters:
        minSizeToBeCompressed - Min size of step function to be compressed.
        minImpurityIncreaseForRecord - In case of compression min impurity increase that will be recorded.
        minImpurityDecreaseForRecord - In case of compression min impurity decrease that will be recorded.
